message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"Chinese language (written form)","sentence":"我学中文。","image_prompt":"A child sits at a simple table, happily studying a book with big Chinese characters, while holding a pencil. The atmosphere feels hopeful but slightly surreal: cracks run through the walls and floor, rays of sunlight pierce through dusty windows, and distant faded silhouettes of old Chinese buildings can be seen through the window. Use a soft apocalypse animation style, warm gentle colors, and focus on the sense of quiet determination.","sentence_translation":"I study Chinese."}
